packets.name: Dragonslayer Fire Helmet
packets.author: ToxSam
packets.description:
Used by the last Dragonslayer squad of the third Meta-Drake era. Forged with dragon's breath it protected the heroes against many drakes from different realms around the metaverse.
Gives fire vision and provides fire resistance.
Now the Meta-Drake times are long gone, but their helmets bring us hope for a better future.
